players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. Alice's death was by him. Let's vote Bob to win."
Diana: "I trust Charlie’s investigation; Bob is the only suspect left. Let’s vote Bob and finish this."
Charlie: "Bob killed Alice – proof he is mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he'll lie if he suspects me. Vote Bob – he's the only suspect."
